plot: Documentary short where the filmmaker and photographer Tomas Pena explores the burgeoning generation of Internet teens with the example of Lola, a girl he known on Tumblr.
title: Six Lola Six
plot_es: Documentary short where the filmmaker and photographer Tomas Pena explores the burgeoning generation of Internet teens with the example of Lola, a girl he known on Tumblr.
plot_en: Documentary short where the filmmaker and photographer Tomas Pena explores the burgeoning generation of Internet teens with the example of Lola, a girl he known on Tumblr.
